Name: Wild Boar
SeedDescription: Plant these in spring or summer. Takes 13 days to mature.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en primavera o verano. Tardan 13 días en madurar.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 봄 또는 여름 작물. 성장하려면 8일이 소요됩니다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: À planter au printemps ou en été. Prend 13 jours pour arriver à maturité.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ezeket tavasszal, vagy nyáron ültesse el. 8 napig tart megérniük.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante isso na primavera ou no verão. Leva 13 dias para amadurecer.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 春天或夏天播种。13天成熟。
